name: git-commit-wizard
description: A customizable VS Code extension for semantic committing, compatible with microservices and multiple source control repositories.
author: Andrii Bohdan

git-commit-wizard.commitTemplate.markdownDescription: Define your Git commit message template with this setting. The default template includes placeholders for prefix, scope, and message. Customize it by modifying the default or adding your own lines. Use '{prefix}', '{scope}', and '{message}' to insert text.

git-commit-wizard.autofillCommits.markdownDescription: Create suggested options for writing commit messages, helping you quickly describe your changes.Select a 'scope' that describes the type of change and a 'message' that provides a brief summary of what you did. Each option has a key (commitOptions label) and a value (code used to fill out the commit message).

repository.title: Repository
